references.reason: This paper provides a foundational context for cognitive diagnosis in online learning environments

references.paper_title: Difficulties in inferring student knowledge from observations
references.reason: This paper highlights a key challenge addressed by the DisenGCD framework: accurately estimating student knowledge from noisy interaction data.

references.paper_title: DIRT: Deep learning enhanced item response theory for cognitive diagnosis
references.reason: This paper represents a significant advance in cognitive diagnosis using deep learning, establishing a benchmark against which DisenGCD is compared.

references.paper_title: Dina model and parameter estimation: A didactic
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational cognitive diagnosis model (DINA) that serves as a baseline for comparison and is enhanced by the proposed method.

references.paper_title: RCD: Relation map driven cognitive diagnosis for intelligent education systems
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art graph neural network-based cognitive diagnosis model that DisenGCD improves upon.
